content.title: Once a week
content.subtitle: 4 Private Lesson Package (90-min)
content.body:
Description:
  • 2 (90-minute) Private Lessons in person / month
  • 2 (90-minute) Online Conversation Sessions / month
  • 6 hours total for $299
  • 2.9% credit card fee
All 4 lessons must be redeemed within 31 days of the first lesson
